name: Disney Violetta Rhythm & Music
description: Tap to the rhythm of Violetta’s hottest tracks. Disney Violetta: Rhythm and Music lets you show off your rhythmic and musical abilities as you score points while watching your favorite music videos from the hit TV series. Think you know everything there is to know about Violetta? Take the Violetta quiz and prove it. Are you ready to test your coordination and timing? Challenge yourself in “Pop Music” and interact with each song like never before. Features Follow your dreams and become a star! Tap to the rhythm of Violetta's hottest tracks Find out how well you know Violetta in Quiz mode Unlock new songs and get the ultimate high score
